sentences.sentence: No Asian country has honored Lincoln more durably than Japan.
sentences.translation: 没有哪个亚洲国家能像日本那样长期对林肯保持尊敬。

sentences.sentence: Durably constructed with a single piece of high tech stainless steel.
sentences.translation: 耐用构建了一个高科技不锈钢单件。

sentences.sentence: Normal ratings (pressures, temperatures, time setting, etc.) shall be durably marked.
sentences.translation: 译：正常极限。压力。温度。时间。将执久标示。
